type.description:
## Is Damageable

---



[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/is_damageable)

Checks if the item is damageable.

Type ID: `origins:is_damageable`




---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:is_damageable"
}
```
